ObscureInLineSetup.Definition: A test case contains ten or more local variables declarations.
ObscureInLineSetup.Steps: 1. Understand the purpose of each variable: For each variable, understand what part of the functionality it is testing. 2. Group variables by functionality: Group variables that test the same functionality. 3. Extract functionality into a separate test case: For each group of variables, extract to separated methods. Or breakdown the test case into several small test cases.
